sources.title: Secrets Of The French Police (1932)
sources.description: Gwili Andre, Gregory Ratoff, Frank Morgan

metadata.Plot: A burglar is recruited to aid the police in finding his kidnapped girlfriend, a lovely but impoverished flower girl. Meanwhile, a deranged Russian emigre has been claiming that his ward is actually Princess Anastasia, last survivor of the Tsar's family--but she seems to behave strangely in the presence of flowers.
metadata.Writer: Samuel Ornitz, Robert Tasker, Ashton Wolfe
metadata.Actors: Gwili Andre, Gregory Ratoff, Frank Morgan
